synopsis.text: Once a year, under the crimson glow of the Scarlet Moon, Harajuku becomes the stage for a unique spectacle: Visual Prison, a musical competition where vampires perform visual kei songs to captivate the audience and gain immense power. Ange Yuki, a lonely orphan seeking a fulfilling life, travels to Harajuku to watch his favorite artist, but instead witnesses an intense musical battle between the bands Eclipse and Lost Eden. As their electrifying performance resonates with his heart, Ange experiences a sudden, sharp pain that forever changes his life. In this world where beautiful immortals gather to compete for power, Ange discovers his own hidden connection to the enchanting world of visual kei and the vampires who inhabit it. As he navigates the mesmerizing world of music and the supernatural, Ange embarks on a thrilling journey of self-discovery and finds himself at the center of the breathtaking Visual Prison.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
